about_the_game:
About
Chimera Island is a casual monster collection and management game created by students. Throughout your journey, raise a group of creatures, train them in various facilities, and improve their stats. In doing so and succeeding on expeditions, restore the desolate landscape to its former lush state. With many different Chimera to discover and facilities to upgrade, players can spend hours immersed and enjoying the island sanctuary they've created.

Chimera
Each of the three starting Chimera has the potential to turn into one of three unique evolutions. By customizing their training, you can adjust the course of their destiny and guide their evolutions down distinct paths. Can you collect all 12 Chimera?

Habitat
Expand your habitat to help train and strengthen your Chimera. Unlock three types of facilities, each specializing in a different type of training to help bring out the potential of your monsters. When ready, send your Chimera out on expeditions and gain resources to help restore the island, upgrade facilities, and further improve your Chimera for the challenges ahead.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 - 10100 / Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Rediscover a lost island with mysterious creatures the world has long since forgotten. Now it is up to you to help restore this ruined world and bring about a new age of Chimera.
